Summary: it was frisbee like and went really fast
Object Shape: Blimp, Boomerang, Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Cone, Chevron, Circle, Cross, Cylinder, Diamond, Disc, Egg, Fireball, Flash, Oval, Saturn-like, Sphere, Square, Rectagular, Star-like, Teardrop, Triangle, Other, Unknown
divs: Sighting Detailswe went outside in the middle of the night for a leisurely stroll. It all started when we saw the flying saucer flying over. It was very fast and strange and didn't stop till we started looking at it. It got mad and started spurting out it's energy from it's bottom. It reacted to out curiousity with it's own curiosity. We believe it was watching us and analyzing us. We will never be the same from this experiment. We wanted to take photos but my cell phone doesn't have a camera and i don't own a camera. It went away as fast as it came leaving only a streak of jet behind it in its wake. We will never forget the experience of such a phenomenon. We lie awake in bed expecting it to return...
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wardner
This sighting has never been favorited.
